alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Windham, southern Tolland and southeastern Hartford Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hebron, or near Glastonbury, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Glastonbury, Mansfield, Windham, Plainfield, Willimantic, Killingly, Coventry, Hebron, Brooklyn, Marlborough, Columbia, Canterbury, Bolton, Andover, Chaplin, Hampton and Scotland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
